domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Food & Beverage Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent and related to foods & beverages such as snacks, soft drinks, beers.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

data.text: Little Venice in London doesn't quite feel like Venice, but it doesn’t feel like London either. It's perfect for an evening walk along the canals, where you can enjoy a tea in a waterside café while admiring the riverboats. Book your tickets today!👉https://t.co/AeMNWOslh5 https://t.co/Vmsp1L8KOC

data.text: @ashhcodes Hi. Please try using a different device. We'd suggest to use a computer or laptop with the newest version of Google Chrome browser as the site is optimalized to that. You can also try clearing your browser history and cookies as those might also affect the website.
@AmantePosesiva Hi. If you don't have any checked-in bags/items then you can proceed to security/gates directly. Have a great flight!

data.text: @_aimeesteeds You can check it under your reservation details online as the price depends on the flight. The airport fees are here: https://t.co/NBKZHOStoD

@paultagil Hi. Due to a busy summer season there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and understanding with this.

data.text: @abodi12356 Hi Abdullah. Our colleagues make sure to reply in the 30 days timeframe after your last sent email. If you didn't receive any e-mails within this timeframe, please reach via our live chat channel and our colleagues will inform you. https://t.co/th7YMTeRwK

@shotokantiger2 Hi. Due to a busy summer season there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and understanding with this.
@_aimeesteeds Hi. You can take a foldable pushchair for free. You can take the car seat instead of one checked-in bag or you need to purchase an extra one.

@Lauraloobyloo Hi. We advise to arrive according to the original time as the check-in and gate opening/closing times might not change.

@SophayEss Hi! You can only take a foldable stroller free of charge. If you'd like to take a car seat too then you need to purchase a checked-in bag in your reservation. Thank you for the understanding.
